name: ani.progress
descr: Get or set how far along the animation has progressed.

formats.name: ani.progress
formats.descr: Get the progress of the animation in percent.

formats.name: ani.progress
formats.descr: Set the progress of the animation in percent.

args.name: progress
args.descr: The progress in percent (i.e. between 0 and 1 inclusive) to set to the animation.

formats.name: ani.time
formats.descr: Get the progress of the animation in milliseconds.

formats.name: ani.time
formats.descr: Set the progress of the animation in milliseconds.

args.name: time
args.descr: The progress in milliseconds (i.e. between 0 and the duration inclusive) to set to the animation.

formats.name: ani.rewind
formats.descr: Rewind the animation to the beginning.

formats.name: ani.fastforward
formats.descr: Fastforward the animation to the end.
